definition: Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself

sentences.english: In that day the Lord will snatch away their finery: the bangles and headbands and crescent necklaces
sentences.chinese: 到那日，主必除掉她们华美的脚钏，发网，月牙圈。

sentences.english: One of the health talk was hosted by CASSA.
sentences.chinese: 华美老年协会举办的健康讲座之一。

sentences.english: However, a series of food safety incidents has damaged the country's reputation for fine cuisine.
sentences.chinese: 然而，一系列食品安全事件却令中华美食名声受损。

sentences.english: Brocade is a class of richly decorative shuttle-woven fabrics, often made in colored silks with  gold and silver threads.
sentences.chinese: 锦是一种华美的织物，由染色的丝绸和金银线织成。

sentences.english: Both castles had their own chapels too, which was incredible to see.
sentences.chinese: 两个城堡都有自己的礼拜堂，非常华美。

sentences.english: Make sacred garments for your brother Aaron, to give him dignity and honor.
sentences.chinese: 你要给你哥哥亚伦作圣衣为荣耀，为华美。

sentences.english: May each one become beautiful in color and redolent of fragrance in the kingdom of God.
sentences.chinese: 使人人在上帝王国里变得华美而芳馨。

sentences.english: This is the "Vantage Wang Zhaohua Metroplex Plaza Chongqing."
sentences.chinese: 这就是“重庆华帝王朝华美达广场酒店”。

sentences.english: I like to see that there are still splendid people on this flat earth.
sentences.chinese: 我高兴地看到在这单调的地球上还有华美的人物。

sentences.english: Jesus, Garment of Light, adorn me!
sentences.chinese: 耶稣，光明的衣袍，使我华美。

sentences.english: I am Tracy from Guangzhou Huamei International School.
sentences.chinese: 我特蕾西从广州华美国际学校。

sentences.english: The Ramada Plaza Pudong-Shanghai is situated in the heart of Jinqiao Export Processing Zone.
sentences.chinese: 上海浦东华美达大酒店坐落于金桥出口加工区的中心。

sentences.english: When are you gonna put Ramada behind you?
sentences.chinese: 你打算什么时候不再想华美达的事了？

sentences.english: So his crystal works were very colourful.
sentences.chinese: 所以他的水晶饰品非常的华美。

sentences.english: The Ramada Plaza Pudong Shanghai believes that human resources are the greatest assets of the hotel.
sentences.chinese: 上海浦东华美达大酒店坚信员工是我们最宝贵的财富。

sentences.english: And thou shalt make holy garments for Aaron thy brother for glory and for beauty.
sentences.chinese: 你要给你哥哥亚伦作圣衣为荣耀，为华美。
